name: Hi！Donut
description:
You are a donut, live in a sweet bread shop.  But one day you wake up and find everybody is leave and the shop change too, you gonna try to get out of the shop and find your friend (this is a demo for only first part of this game which is get out of the shop)

A bullet-list of features: cute food theme game with special  2D mechanic

How to play：

press A and D to turn platform，A for turn left，D for turn right

Press E and Q to let donut jump，E for jump right，Q for jump left
